entry.title: WIND WARNING , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 11:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: W 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Fog. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 10:26 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:26 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 10:26 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing. Windy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 10:26 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
